member.summary: IgnoreDependencies - Ignore dependencies when installing package(s).

member.summary: Skip Powershell - Do not run chocolateyInstall.ps1. Defaults to false.

member.summary: User - used with authenticated feeds. Defaults to empty.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyInstallTask.Password(System.String)
member.summary: Password - the user's password to the source. Defaults to empty.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyInstallTask.Cert(System.String)
member.summary: Client certificate - PFX pathname for an x509 authenticated feeds. Defaults to empty. Available in 0.9.10+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyInstallTask.CertPassword(System.String)
member.summary: Certificate Password - the client certificate's password to the source. Defaults to empty. Available in 0.9.10+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyInstallTask.IgnoreChecksums
member.summary: IgnoreChecksums - Ignore checksums provided by the package. Overrides the default feature 'checksumFiles' set to 'True'. Available in 0.9.9.9+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyInstallTask.AllowEmptyChecksums
member.summary: Allow Empty Checksums - Allow packages to have empty/missing checksums for downloaded resources from non-secure locations (HTTP, FTP). Use this switch is not recommended if using sources that download resources from the internet. Overrides the default feature 'allowEmptyChecksums' set to 'False'. Available in 0.10.0+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyInstallTask.AllowEmptyChecksumsSecure
member.summary: Allow Empty Checksums Secure - Allow packages to have empty checksums for downloaded resources from secure locations (HTTPS). Overrides the default feature 'allowEmptyChecksumsSecure' set to 'True'. Available in 0.10.0+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyInstallTask.RequireCheckSums
member.summary: Require Checksums - Requires packages to have checksums for downloaded resources (both non-secure and secure). Overrides the default feature 'allowEmptyChecksums' set to 'False' and 'allowEmptyChecksumsSecure' set to 'True'. Available in 0.10.0+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyInstallTask.DownloadChecksum(System.String)
member.summary: Download Checksum - a user provided checksum for downloaded resources for the package. Overrides the package checksum (if it has one). Defaults to empty. Available in 0.10.0+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyInstallTask.DownloadChecksumX64(System.String)
member.summary: Download Checksum 64bit - a user provided checksum for 64bit downloaded resources for the package. Overrides the package 64-bit checksum (if it has one). Defaults to same as Download Checksum. Available in 0.10.0+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyInstallTask.DownloadChecksumType(System.String)
member.summary: Download Checksum Type 64bit - a user provided checksum for 64bit downloaded resources for the package. Overrides the package 64-bit checksum (if it has one). Used in conjunction with Download Checksum 64bit. Available values are 'md5', 'sha1', 'sha256' or 'sha512'. Defaults to same as Download Checksum Type. Available in 0.10.0+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyInstallTask.IgnorePackageExitCodes
member.summary: IgnorePackageExitCodes - Exit with a 0 for success and 1 for non-succes-s, no matter what package scripts provide for exit codes. Overrides the default feature 'usePackageExitCodes' set to 'True'. Available in 0.-9.10+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyInstallTask.UsePackageExitCodes
member.summary: UsePackageExitCodes - Package scripts can provide exit codes. Use those for choco's exit code when non-zero (this value can come from a dependency package). Chocolatey defines valid exit codes as 0, 1605, 1614, 1641, 3010. Overrides the default feature 'usePackageExitCodes' set to 'True'. Available in 0.9.10+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyInstallTask.ExitWhenRebotDetected
member.summary: Exit When Reboot Detected - Stop running install, upgrade, or uninstall when a reboot request is detected. Requires 'usePackageExitCodes' feature to be turned on. Will exit with either 350 or 1604. Overrides the default feature 'exitOnRebootDetected' set to 'False'. Available in 0.10.12+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyInstallTask.IgnoreDetectedReboot
member.summary: Ignore Detected Reboot - Ignore any detected reboots if found. Overrides the default feature 'exitOnRebootDetected' set to 'False'. Available in 0.10.12+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyInstallTask.SkipDownloadCache
member.summary: Skip Download Cache - Use the original download even if a private CDN cache is available for a package. Overrides the default feature 'downloadCache' set to 'True'. Available in 0.9.10+. [Licensed editions](https://chocolatey.org/compare) only. See https://chocolatey.org/docs/features-private-cdn.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyInstallTask.SkipVirusCheck
member.summary: kip Virus Check - Skip the virus check for downloaded files on this run. Overrides the default feature 'virusCheck' set to 'True'. Available in 0.9.10+. [Licensed editions](https://chocolatey.org/compare) only. See https://chocolate-y.org/docs/features-virus-check.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyInstallTask.VirusCheck
member.summary: Virus Check - check downloaded files for viruses. Overrides the default feature 'virusCheck' set to 'True'. Available in 0.9.10+. Licensed editions only. See https://chocolatey.org/docs/features-virus-check.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyInstallTask.VirusPositiveMin
member.summary: Virus Check Minimum Scan Result Positives - the minimum number of scan result positives required to flag a package. Used when virusScannerType is VirusTotal. Overrides the default configuration value 'virusCheckMinimumPositives' set to '5'. Available in 0.9.10+. Licensed editions only. See https://chocolatey.org/docs/features-virus-check.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyInstallTask.InstallArgumentsSensitive(System.String)
member.summary: InstallArgumentsSensitive - Install Arguments to pass to the native installer in the package that are sensitive and you do not want logged. Defaults to unspecified. Available in 0.10.1+. [Licensed editions](https://chocolatey.org/compare) only.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyInstallTask.PackageParametersSensitive(System.String)
member.summary: PackageParametersSensitive - Package Parameters to pass the package that are sensitive and you do not want logged. Defaults to unspecified. Available in 0.10.1+. [Licensed editions](https://chocolatey.org/compare) only.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyInstallTask.MaxDownloadRate(System.Int32)
member.summary: Maximum Download Rate Bits Per Second - The maximum download rate in bits per second. '0' or empty means no maximum. A number means that will be the maximum download rate in bps. Defaults to config setting of '0'. Available in [licensed editions](https://chocolatey.org/compare) v1.10+ only. See https://chocolate- y.org/docs/features-package-throttle.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyInstallTask.ReducePackageSize
member.summary: Reducer Installed Package Size (Package Reducer) - Reduce size of the nupkg file to very small and remove extracted archives and installers. Overrides the default feature 'reduceInstalledPackageSpaceUsage' set to 'True'. [Licensed editions](https://chocolatey.org/compare) only (version 1.12.0+). See https://chocolate-y.org/docs/features-package-reducer.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyInstallTask.NoReducePackageSize
member.summary: Do Not Reduce Installed Package Size - Leave the nupkg and files alone in the package. Overrides the default feature 'reduceInstalledPackageSpaceUsage' set to 'True'. [Licensed editions](https://chocolatey.org/compare) only (version 1.12.0+). See https://chocolatey.org/docs/features-package-reducer.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyInstallTask.ReduceNupkgOnly
member.summary: Reduce Only Nupkg File Size - reduce only the size of nupkg file when using Package Reducer. Overrides the default feature 'reduceOnlyNupkgSize' set to 'False'. [Licensed editions](https://chocolatey.org/compare) only (version -1.12.0+). See https://chocolatey.org/docs/features-package-reducer.

member.summary: TemplateName - Use a named template in C:\ProgramData\chocolatey\templates\templatename instead of built-in template. Available in 0.9.9.9+. Manage templates as packages in 0.9.10+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyNewTask.Version(System.String)

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyNewTask.UseBuiltInTemplate
member.summary: BuiltInTemplate - Use the original built-in template instead of any override. Available in 0.9.10+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyNewTask.FileOrUrl(System.String)
member.summary: detection (native installer, zip, patch/upgrade file, or remote url to download first) to completely create a package with proper silent arguments! member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyNewTask.UseOriginalFilesLocation
member.summary: Use Original Files Location - when using file or url, use the original location in packaging. Available in [licensed editions](https://chocolatey.org/compare) only (licensed version 1.6.0+).

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyNewTask.DownloadCheckSum(System.String)
member.summary: Download Checksum - checksum to verify File/Url with. Defaults to empty. Available in [licensed editions](https://chocolatey.org/compare) only (licensed version 1.7.0+).

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyNewTask.DownloadChecksumType(System.String)
member.summary: Download Checksum Type - checksum type for File/Url (and optional separate 64-bit files when specifying both). Used in conjunction with Download Checksum and Download Checksum 64-bit. member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyNewTask.PauseOnError
member.summary: Pause on Error - Pause when there is an error with creating the package. Available in [licensed editions](https://chocolatey.org/compare) only (licensed version 1.7.0+).

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyNewTask.BuildPackages
member.summary: Build Package - Attempt to compile the package after creating it. Available in [licensed editions](https://chocolatey.org/compare) only (licensed version 1.7.0+).

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyNewTask.FromProgramsAndFeatures
member.summary: /// Generate Packages From Installed Software - Generate packages from the installed software on a system (does not handle dependencies). Available in Business editions only (licensed version 1.8.0+).

member.summary: Include Architecture in Package Name - Leave x86, x64, 64-bit, etc as part of the package id. Default setting is to remove architecture. Available in Business editions only (licensed version 1.8.0+).

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUninstallTask.UsePackageExitCodes

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUninstallTask.UseAutoUninstaller
member.summary: UseAutoUninstaller - Use auto uninstaller service when uninstalling. Overrides the default feature 'autoUninstaller' set to 'True'. Available in 0.9.10+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUninstallTask.SkipAutoInstaller
member.summary: SkipAutoUninstaller - Skip auto uninstaller service when uninstalling. Overrides the default feature 'autoUninstaller' set to 'True'. Available in 0.9.10+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUninstallTask.FailOnAutoUninstaller
member.summary: FailOnAutoUninstaller - Fail the package uninstall if the auto uninstaller reports and error. Overrides the default feature 'failOnAutoUninstaller' set to 'False'. Available in 0.9.10+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUninstallTask.IgnoreAutoUninstallerFailure
member.summary: --ignoreautouninstallerfailure, --ignore-autouninstaller-failure Ignore Auto Uninstaller Failure - Do not fail the package if auto uninstaller reports an error. Overrides the default feature 'failOnAutoUninstaller' set to 'False'. Available in 0.9.10+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUninstallTask.StopOnFirstPackageFailure
member.summary: Stop On First Package Failure - stop running install, upgrade or uninstall on first package failure instead of continuing with others. Overrides the default feature 'stopOnFirstPackageFailure' set to 'False'. Available in 0.10.4+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUninstallTask.ExitWhenRebootDetected
member.summary: Exit When Reboot Detected - Stop running install, upgrade, or uninstall when a reboot request is detected. Requires 'usePackageExitCodes' feature to be turned on. Will exit with either 350 or 1604. Overrides the default feature 'exitOnRebootDetected' set to 'False'. Available in 0.10.12+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUninstallTask.IgnoreDetectedReboot
member.summary: Ignore Detected Reboot - Ignore any detected reboots if found. Overrides the default feature 'exitOnRebootDetected' set to 'False'. Available in 0.10.12+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUninstallTask.FromProgramsAndFeatures
member.summary: From Programs and Features - Uninstalls a program from programs and features. Name used for id must be a match or a wildcard (*) to Display Name in Programs and Features. Available in [licensed editions](https://chocolatey.org/compare) only (licensed version 1.8.0+) and requires v0.10.4+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.Source(System.String)
member.summary: Source - The source to find the package(s) to install. Special sources include: ruby, webpi, cygwin, windowsfeatures, and python. To specify more than one source, pass it with a semi-colon separating the values (-e.g. "'source1;source2'"). Defaults to default feeds.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.Version(System.String)
member.summary: Version - A specific version to install. Defaults to unspecified.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.IncludePrerelease
member.summary: Prerelease - Include Prereleases? Defaults to false.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.ForceX86
member.summary: ForceX86 - Force x86 (32bit) installation on 64 bit systems. Defaults to false.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.InstallArguments(System.String)
member.summary: InstallArguments - Install Arguments to pass to the native installer in the package. Defaults to unspecified.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.ApplyInstallArgumentsToDependencies
member.summary: Apply Install Arguments To Dependencies - Should install arguments be applied to dependent packages? Defaults to false.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.ApplyPackageParametersToDependencies
member.summary: Apply Package Parameters To Dependencies - Should package parameters be applied to dependent packages? Defaults to false.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.AllowDowngrade
member.summary: AllowDowngrade - Should an attempt at downgrading be allowed? Defaults to false.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.ForceDependencies
member.summary: ForceDependencies - Force dependencies to be reinstalled when force installing package(s). Must be used in conjunction with --force.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.IgnoreDependencies
member.summary: IgnoreDependencies - Ignore dependencies when installing package(s).

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.SkipAutomationScripts
member.summary: Skip Powershell - Do not run chocolateyInstall.ps1. Defaults to false.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.User(System.String)
member.summary: User - used with authenticated feeds. Defaults to empty.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.Password(System.String)
member.summary: Password - the user's password to the source. Defaults to empty.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.Cert(System.String)
member.summary: Client certificate - PFX pathname for an x509 authenticated feeds. Defaults to empty. Available in 0.9.10+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.CertPassword(System.String)
member.summary: Certificate Password - the client certificate's password to the source. Defaults to empty. Available in 0.9.10+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.IgnoreChecksums
member.summary: IgnoreChecksums - Ignore checksums provided by the package. Overrides the default feature 'checksumFiles' set to 'True'. Available in 0.9.9.9+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.Except(System.String)
member.summary: Except - a comma-separated list of package names that should not be upgraded when upgrading 'all'. Defaults to empty. Available in 0.9.10+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.SkipIfNotInstalled
member.summary: Skip Packages Not Installed - if a package is not installed, do not install it during the upgrade process. Overrides the default feature 'skipPackageUpgradesWhenNotInstalled' set to 'False'. Available in 0.1-0.12+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.AllowEmptyChecksums
member.summary: Allow Empty Checksums - Allow packages to have empty/missing checksums for downloaded resources from non-secure locations (HTTP, FTP). Use this switch is not recommended if using sources that download resources from the internet. Overrides the default feature 'allowEmptyChecksums' set to 'False'. Available in 0.10.0+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.AllowEmptyChecksumsSecure
member.summary: Allow Empty Checksums Secure - Allow packages to have empty checksums for downloaded resources from secure locations (HTTPS). Overrides the default feature 'allowEmptyChecksumsSecure' set to 'True'. Available in 0.10.0+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.RequireCheckSums
member.summary: Require Checksums - Requires packages to have checksums for downloaded resources (both non-secure and secure). Overrides the default feature 'allowEmptyChecksums' set to 'False' and 'allowEmptyChecksumsSecure' set to 'True'. Available in 0.10.0+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.DownloadChecksum(System.String)
member.summary: Download Checksum - a user provided checksum for downloaded resources for the package. Overrides the package checksum (if it has one). Defaults to empty. Available in 0.10.0+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.DownloadChecksumX64(System.String)
member.summary: Download Checksum 64bit - a user provided checksum for 64bit downloaded resources for the package. Overrides the package 64-bit checksum (if it has one). Defaults to same as Download Checksum. Available in 0.10.0+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.DownloadChecksumType(System.String)
member.summary: Download Checksum Type 64bit - a user provided checksum for 64bit downloaded resources for the package. Overrides the package 64-bit checksum (if it has one). Used in conjunction with Download Checksum 64bit. Available values are 'md5', 'sha1', 'sha256' or 'sha512'. Defaults to same as Download Checksum Type. Available in 0.10.0+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.IgnorePackageExitCodes
member.summary: IgnorePackageExitCodes - Exit with a 0 for success and 1 for non-succes-s, no matter what package scripts provide for exit codes. Overrides the default feature 'usePackageExitCodes' set to 'True'. Available in 0.-9.10+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.UsePackageExitCodes
member.summary: UsePackageExitCodes - Package scripts can provide exit codes. Use those for choco's exit code when non-zero (this value can come from a dependency package). Chocolatey defines valid exit codes as 0, 1605, 1614, 1641, 3010. Overrides the default feature 'usePackageExitCodes' set to 'True'. Available in 0.9.10+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.ExitWhenRebotDetected
member.summary: Exit When Reboot Detected - Stop running install, upgrade, or uninstall when a reboot request is detected. Requires 'usePackageExitCodes' feature to be turned on. Will exit with either 350 or 1604. Overrides the default feature 'exitOnRebootDetected' set to 'False'. Available in 0.10.12+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.IgnoreDetectedReboot
member.summary: Ignore Detected Reboot - Ignore any detected reboots if found. Overrides the default feature 'exitOnRebootDetected' set to 'False'. Available in 0.10.12+.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.SkipDownloadCache
member.summary: Skip Download Cache - Use the original download even if a private CDN cache is available for a package. Overrides the default feature 'downloadCache' set to 'True'. Available in 0.9.10+. [Licensed editions](https://chocolatey.org/compare) only. See https://chocolatey.org/docs/features-private-cdn.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.SkipVirusCheck
member.summary: kip Virus Check - Skip the virus check for downloaded files on this run. Overrides the default feature 'virusCheck' set to 'True'. Available in 0.9.10+. [Licensed editions](https://chocolatey.org/compare) only. See https://chocolate-y.org/docs/features-virus-check.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.VirusCheck
member.summary: Virus Check - check downloaded files for viruses. Overrides the default feature 'virusCheck' set to 'True'. Available in 0.9.10+. Licensed editions only. See https://chocolatey.org/docs/features-virus-check.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.VirusPositiveMin
member.summary: Virus Check Minimum Scan Result Positives - the minimum number of scan result positives required to flag a package. Used when virusScannerType is VirusTotal. Overrides the default configuration value 'virusCheckMinimumPositives' set to '5'. Available in 0.9.10+. Licensed editions only. See https://chocolatey.org/docs/features-virus-check.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.InstallArgumentsSensitive(System.String)
member.summary: InstallArgumentsSensitive - Install Arguments to pass to the native installer in the package that are sensitive and you do not want logged. Defaults to unspecified. Available in 0.10.1+. [Licensed editions](https://chocolatey.org/compare) only.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.PackageParametersSensitive(System.String)
member.summary: PackageParametersSensitive - Package Parameters to pass the package that are sensitive and you do not want logged. Defaults to unspecified. Available in 0.10.1+. [Licensed editions](https://chocolatey.org/compare) only.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.MaxDownloadRate(System.Int32)
member.summary: Maximum Download Rate Bits Per Second - The maximum download rate in bits per second. '0' or empty means no maximum. A number means that will be the maximum download rate in bps. Defaults to config setting of '0'. Available in [licensed editions](https://chocolatey.org/compare) v1.10+ only. See https://chocolate- y.org/docs/features-package-throttle.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.ReducePackageSize
member.summary: Reducer Installed Package Size (Package Reducer) - Reduce size of the nupkg file to very small and remove extracted archives and installers. Overrides the default feature 'reduceInstalledPackageSpaceUsage' set to 'True'. [Licensed editions](https://chocolatey.org/compare) only (version 1.12.0+). See https://chocolate-y.org/docs/features-package-reducer.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.NoReducePackageSize
member.summary: Do Not Reduce Installed Package Size - Leave the nupkg and files alone in the package. Overrides the default feature 'reduceInstalledPackageSpaceUsage' set to 'True'. [Licensed editions](https://chocolatey.org/compare) only (version 1.12.0+). See https://chocolatey.org/docs/features-package-reducer.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Chocolatey.ChocolateyUpgradeTask.ReduceNupkgOnly
member.summary: Reduce Only Nupkg File Size - reduce only the size of nupkg file when using Package Reducer. Overrides the default feature 'reduceOnlyNupkgSize' set to 'False'. [Licensed editions](https://chocolatey.org/compare) only (version -1.12.0+). See https://chocolatey.org/docs/features-package-reducer.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Git.GitAddTask.#ctor
member.summary: Task updates the index using the current content found in the working tree, to prepare the content staged for the next commit.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Git.GitAddTask.PathSpec(System.String)
member.summary: Files to add content from. Fileglobs (e.g. *.c) can be given to add all matching files. Also a leading directory name (e.g. dir to add dir/file1 and dir/file2) can be given to update the index to match the current state of the directory as a whole.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Git.GitAddTask.Verbose
member.summary: Be verbose.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Git.GitAddTask.DryRun
member.summary: Dont actually add the file(s), just show if they exist and/or will be ignored.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Git.GitAddTask.Force
member.summary: allow adding otherwise ignored files.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Git.GitAddTask.IgnoreErrors
member.summary: just skip files which cannot be added because of errors.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Git.GitAddTask.Interactive
member.summary: Add modified contents in the working tree interactively to the index. Optional path arguments may be supplied to limit operation to a subset of the working tree.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Git.GitAddTask.Patch
member.summary: Interactively choose hunks of patch between the index and the work tree and add them to the index. This gives the user a chance to review the difference before adding modified contents to the index.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Git.GitAddTask.IgnoreRemoval
member.summary: Update the index by adding new files that are unknown to the index and files modified in the working tree, but ignore files that have been removed from the working tree.

member.summary: List branches.

member.summary: Do not set up "upstream" configuration, even if the branch.autoSetupMerge configuration variable is true.

member.summary: When switching branches, if you have local modifications to one or more files that are different between the current branch and the branch to which you are switching, the command refuses to switch branches in order to preserve your modifications in context.

member.summary: Construct a commit message for use with rebase --autosquash. The commit message will be the subject line from the specified commit with a prefix of "fixup! ". See git-rebase[1] for details.

member.summary: Take the commit message from the given file. Use - to read the message from the standard input.

member.summary: Override the author date used in the commit.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Git.GitCommitTask.Template
member.summary: When editing the commit message, start the editor with the contents in the given file. The commit.template configuration variable is often used to give this option implicitly to the command.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Git.GitCommitTask.SignOff
member.summary: Add Signed-off-by line by the committer at the end of the commit log message.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Git.GitCommitTask.NoVerify
member.summary: This option bypasses the pre-commit and commit-msg hooks. See also githooks[5].

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Git.GitCommitTask.AllowEmpty
member.summary: Usually recording a commit that has the exact same tree as its sole parent commit is a mistake, and the command prevents you from making such a commit.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Git.GitCommitTask.AllowEmptyMessage
member.summary: Like --allow-empty this command is primarily for use by foreign SCM interface scripts. It allows you to create a commit with an empty commit message without using plumbing commands

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Git.GitCommitTask.NoEdit
member.summary: Use the selected commit message without launching an editor. For example, git commit --amend --no-edit amends a commit without changing its commit message.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Git.GitCommitTask.Amend
member.summary: Replace the tip of the current branch by creating a new commit.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Git.GitCommitTask.NoPostRewrite
member.summary: Bypass the post-rewrite hook.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Git.GitCommitTask.UntrackedFiles

member.summary: Refuse to merge and exit with a non-zero status unless the current HEAD is already up to date or the merge can be resolved as a fast-forward.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.NetCore.DotnetMsBuildTask.Logger(System.String)
member.summary: Use this logger to log events from MSBuild. To specify multiple loggers, specify each logger separately.

member.summary: -binaryLogger[:[LogFile=]output.binlog[;ProjectImports={None,Embed,ZipFile}]] Serializes all build events to a compressed binary file.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.NetCore.DotnetMsBuildTask.WarnAsMessage(System.String)
member.summary: List of warning codes to treats as low importance messages. Use a semicolon or a comma to separate multiple extensions. Example: -warnAsMessage:MSB3026

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.NetCore.DotnetMsBuildTask.IgnoreProjectExtensions(System.String)
member.summary: List of extensions to ignore when determining which project file to build. Use a semicolon or a comma to separate multiple extensions. Example: -ignoreProjectExtensions:.sln

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.NetCore.DotnetMsBuildTask.NodeReuse(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enables or Disables the reuse of MSBuild nodes.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.NetCore.DotnetMsBuildTask.Preprocess(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a single, aggregated project file by inlining all the files that would be imported during a build, with their boundaries marked. This can be useful for figuring out what files are being imported and from where, and what they will contribute to the build.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.NetCore.DotnetMsBuildTask.DetailedSummary
member.summary: Shows detailed information at the end of the build about the configurations built and how they were scheduled to nodes.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.NetCore.DotnetMsBuildTask.Restore
member.summary: Runs a target named Restore prior to building other targets and ensures the build for these targets uses the latest restored build logic. This is useful when your project tree requires packages to be restored before it can be built.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.NetCore.DotnetMsBuildTask.RestoreProperty(System.String)
member.summary: Set or override these project-level properties only during restore and do not use properties specified with the -property argument. Example: -restoreProperty:IsRestore=true;MyProperty=value

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.NetCore.DotnetMsBuildTask.ProfileEvaluation(System.String)
member.summary: Profiles MSBuild evaluation and writes the result to the specified file. If the extension of the specified file is '.md', the result is generated in markdown format. Otherwise, a tab separated file is produced.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.NetCore.DotnetMsBuildTask.Interactive
member.summary: Indicates that actions in the build are allowed to interact with the user. Do not use this argument in an automated scenario where interactivity is not expected.

member.name: T:FlubuCore.Tasks.Testing.NUnitWithDotCoverTask
member.summary: Runs NUnit tests in combination with dotCover test coverage analysis.

remarks.para: The task uses dotCover command line tool to run NUnit command line runner which executes tests for the specified assembly or C# project.
The task uses to download dotCover command line tool into the running user's local application data directory. If the tool is already there, the task skips downloading it.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that will execute tests in the specified list of test assemblies using the specified NUnit test runner executable.
member.param: The file path to NUnit's console runner.
The list of of file paths to the assemblies containing unit tests.

member.summary: Gets the path to the generated dotCover test coverage XML report.

member.summary: Gets the path to the generated dotCover test coverage HTML report.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Testing.NUnitWithDotCoverTask.FailBuildOnViolations
member.summary: If Set build will fail if the test coverage of any class is below .
member.remarks: If is not set the task will only print out information about violating classes without failing the build. The default value is true.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Testing.NUnitWithDotCoverTask.MinRequiredCoverage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the minimum required test coverage percentage. If any class has the test coverage below this value and is set to true, the task will fail the build.

member.summary: Sets the command line options for NUnit console runner (as a single string).

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Testing.NUnitWithDotCoverTask.DotCoverFilters(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the dotCover filters that will be passed to dotCover's /Filters command line parameter.
member.remarks: The default filters are set to -:module=*.Tests;-:class=*Contract;-:class=*Contract`*. For more information, visit here.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Testing.NUnitWithDotCoverTask.DotCoverAttributeFilters(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the dotCover attribute filters that will be passed to dotCover's /AttributeFilters command line parameter. Attribute filters tell dotCover to skip the analysis of any code that has the specified attribute(s) applied.
member.remarks: The default attribute filters are set to "*.ExcludeFromCodeCoverageAttribute". For more information, visit here.
